body:
Im leaving, Im going to be looking at the forums sometimes, but yeah.

The reason: 1.8

I really loved this server, but 1.8 is hell, Ima probs join OCN.

Bai.

PS: If the server comes back to 1.7 Im coming back with it :D

title: Leaving.

replies.body:
I just don't understand.
Whats wrong with 1.8?
thats all i use, and with optifine its beautiful!

replies.body: What is so bad about 1.8? It was a matter of time before they switched to 1.8 anyway. All server will go to 1.8 soon so you might as well get used to it or don't play Minecraft at all. Sorry if that sounded rude. Well, see ya and gl in life o/ See you on OCN I guess.
